page.title: 01Dores/Abriachan_Summary
page.content: These two villages lie on opposite shores of {Loch Ness}.Loch Ness is famous for its legendary monster,{ {Nessie}.Many local people claim to have seen the monster.A {Wave Energy {Project }is based at {Dores}on the south_eastern shore of the loch.{ {Abriachan},on the north_western shore,offers a panoramic view of the loch seen from above.A {Wellington {Bomber}has lain beneath the waves since W.W.11.{Watersports}naturally feature prominently as a {tourist {attraction}.The annual{Dores Gala}is held in{June.General Wade's road} borders one loch shore,while the A82 runs along the other, north to { {Inverness}.
